BBEX3.A.AMD.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Armenia / EUR 1 = AMD ... (middle)
Source: Central Bank of Armenia, Yerevan.
Methodology: Up until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, and from 2001 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
Comment on 2009: Exchange rate floated as from 3 March 2009.
